arts.ttl: Genoa vs Lazio wraps up the fifth matchday
arts.sum: Lazio have gone without goals for two consecutive away matches in Serie A - this had not happened since the 2020/21 season when they failed to score for 3 matches in a row, away to Fiorentina, Roma, and Sassuolo, all in May. Genoa aim to achieve their first win of the season, while Lazio hope to get back on track after their derby defeat.
